Commands.Doublehand+: 1-HIT BRV attack and grants Medium Max BRV Up for 5 turns.
Commands.Missile: 2-HIT BRV attack.  First hit lowers target's BRV by 1/4.
Commands.Missile+: First hit lowers target's BRV by 1/2.  Raises all party members' BRV based on Bartz's Max BRV and grants him Small Speed Up for 5 turns.
Commands.Iainuki: 1-HIT BRV+HP.  Slightly raises Max BRV, Attack and Speed for 5 turns.

Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Doublehand Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Doublehand.
Passives.Master Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV after mastering an ability.
Passives.Critical BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after dealing a critical hit.
Passives.Missile Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Missile.
Passives.Doublehand Charge: Increases the max uses of Doublehand by 1.
Passives.Spirit of Competition: Grants 100% critical hit rate when BRV equals or exceeds Initial BRV and target's BRV is over twice of that BRV.
Passives.Missile Charge: Increases the max uses of Missile by 1.
Passives.Freelancer Master: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense of all party members after mastering two abilities.
Passives.Master Attack&Speed Up: Moderately raises Attack and slightly raises Speed after mastering an ability.
Passives.Doublehand Extend: Shortens Doublehand's mastery requirement by 2.When using Doublehand:- Increases its number of hits to 2.- Moderately raises its potency.- Grants Small Max BRV Up for 3 turns.- Triggers an HP attack when BRV is over 80% Max BRV.When using Doublehand+:- Increases its number of hits to 2.- Moderately raises its potency.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV.- Slightly raises the potency of the Max BRV Up buff.- Triggers an HP attack when BRV is over 80% Max BRV.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ for 5 turns after using Doublehand/Doublehand+.BRV Attack+ has the following effects:- Sets the target's BRV to 4/5 before the BRV attack.- Deals a 1-HIT BRV attack.- Raises all allies' BRV based on Attack.
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost All: Slightly raises party's Max BRV and Attack while buffed.
Passives.Missile Extend: Increases Missile's max uses by 1.Shortens its mastery requirement by 1.When using Missile:- Slightly raises its potency.- Slightly raises its BRV reduction effect.- Grants Small Speed Up for 3 turns.- Triggers an HP attack when BRV is over 80% Max BRV.When using Missile+:- Increases its numbers of hits to 2.- Moderately raises its total potency.- Slightly raises its BRV reduction effect.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120%.Triggers an HP attack after use.

Weapons.Great Sword CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Iainuki.
Weapons.Chocoblade CP: 15: Increases Doublehand's potency and further increases it when it's mastered.
Weapons.Sword of the Echo of a Wanderer CP: 15: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Doublehand ,  Doublehand+ ,  Missile  and  Missile+
Weapons.Mythril Sword CP: 35: Inflicts Small Defense Down for 2 turns after using Missile.When mastered, increases the potency of Missile's second hit and extends the duration of the Defense Down to 3 turns.
Weapons.Noir Calibur CP: 15: Slightly raises Attack and Speed of all allies after mastering an ability.
